[Seal of Strife]
The Seal of Strife bestows the following abilities:
Weak Defense Mercenaries: The lord of each castle is only allowed to hire the raw recruits that are weaker than seasoned mercenaries.
Decreased Strength of Castle Gates and Walls: The strength of castle gates and walls decreases significantly.
Increase in the Cost to Upgrade the Castle Gates and Walls: Upgrading castle gates and walls becomes very expensive.
Reduced Tax Rate Limit: The maximum tax rate is reduced.
"I wish to fight for the Seal of Strife."
